net.openhft.chronicle.engine.api.pubsub

Interface Reference<E>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Publisher<E>, java.util.function.Supplier<E>, Visitable<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapReference, QueueReference, RemoteReference

    public interface Reference<E>
extends Publisher<E>, java.util.function.Supplier<E>, Visitable<E>
    Hold a reference to a specific topic/key.
